title: Why do I have some exp towards 31?

replies.body: Riot have brought in uncapped levelling as one of the preseason changes.

> [{quoted}](name=Challenger Zoe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uKBrjs0d,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-08T19:20:58.522+0000)
>
> Riot have brought in uncapped levelling as one of the preseason changes.

yeah, but I'm banned and have been since before the change. I haven't played a game since the change. I have more exp than I should.
Levels go up to wun fiddy now
